attributes.action: Removal of Bedroom Tax for the Disabled Couples
attributes.additional_details:
Should a couple with a/or both partners pay for an extra room that is used? No . . . Then sign this petition for reform.

Think of it maybe they want to sleep in the same room but its impossible due to the illness severity of the disabled party i.e. Arthritis that can cause great discomfort to that disabled partner.

Should someone who is clearly unable to work suffer more? Hasn't pride already taken a knock?
